title: Mixed bean and orange salad
ingredients: ['50g (1¾ oz) thin green beans, trimmed and halved crossways', '3 talebspoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons wholegrain mustard', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 oranges', '1 can red kidney beans, about 420 g, drained and rinsed', '½ small red onion, finely chopped', '30g (1 oz) watercress sprigs, tough stalks discarded', '4 large radicchio leaves', 'salt and pepper']
